targets.query: SELECT 1-last("usage_idle")+100 AS "used_percent" FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "cpu" =~ /^cpu-total$/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("n_cpus") AS "n_cpus" FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("used_percent") AS "used_percent" FROM "mem" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("total") AS "total" FROM "mem" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("used_percent") AS "used_percent" FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "path" =~ /^\/$/) AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("total") AS "total" FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("used_percent") AS "used_percent" FROM "swap" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("total") AS "total" FROM "swap" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("load15") AS "load15" FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used") AS "used" FROM "mem" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("used") AS "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("used") AS "total" FROM "swap" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("uptime") AS "uptime" FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("n_users") AS "n_users" FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("total") AS "total" FROM "processes" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("n_containers_running") AS "n_containers_running" FROM "docker" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("bytes_recv"), 1s)*8 AS "download" FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("bytes_sent"), 1s)*8 AS "upload" FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT epoch, last("epoch_progress") AS "epoch_progress" FROM "solana" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("epoch_progress") AS "epoch_progress" FROM "solana" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("epoch_end_time") AS "epoch_end_time" FROM "solana" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("leader_slot_time") AS "leader_slot_time" FROM "solana" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("status") AS "status" FROM "solana" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("version") AS "version" FROM "solana" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("validator_commission") AS "validator_commission" FROM "solana" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("identity_balance") AS "identity_balance" FROM "solana" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("vote_balance") AS "vote_balance" FROM "solana" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)

SELECT last("solana_price") AS "solana_price", "total_slots", "passed_slots", "skipped_slots", "validator_skip_rate", "cluster_skip_rate", "credits", "stake", "stake_reward" + "slot_rewards" AS rewards, "costs", "profit", "profit_usd" FROM "solana" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY "epoch" fill(null)
SELECT last("validator_skip_rate") AS "Validator", "cluster_skip_rate" AS "Cluster" FROM "solana" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("passed_slots") AS "Passed", "skipped_slots" AS "Skipped" FROM "solana" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("credits") AS "Credits" FROM "solana" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("identity_balance") AS "Identity account", "vote_balance" AS "Vote account" FROM "solana" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT "container_image", "container_status", last("uptime_ns")/1000000000 AS "uptime" FROM "docker_container_status" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND time >= $__to*1000000 - 1m GROUP BY "container_name" fill(none)
SELECT last("usage_percent") AS "usage_percent" FROM "docker_container_cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "container_name" fill(none)
SELECT last("usage") AS "usage" FROM "docker_container_mem" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "container_name" fill(none)
SELECT "process_name", "user", last("cpu_usage") AS "cpu_usage", "memory_usage" FROM "procstat" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND time >= $__to*1000000 - 1m GROUP BY "pid"::tag fill(null)
SELECT "load", "active", last("sub_code") AS "sub_code" FROM "systemd_units" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND time >= $__to*1000000 - 1m GROUP BY "name" fill(null)
SELECT last("usage_user") AS "User", last("usage_system") AS "System" FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "cpu" =~ /^cpu-total$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("load1") AS "1 min", last("load5") AS "5 min", last("load15") AS "15 min" FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT 100 - last("usage_idle") AS "used_percent" FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "cpu" =~ /cpu[0-9].*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "cpu" fill(null)
SELECT last("used") AS "used" FROM "mem" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used") AS "used" FROM "swap" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used") AS "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT derivative(last("reads"), 1s) AS "read", derivative(last("writes"), 1s) AS "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "name" =~ /^$drive$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last(bytes_recv),1s)*8 as "download", non_negative_derivative(last(bytes_sent),1s)*8 as "upload"  FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /$host/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT last(bytes_recv) as "in", last(bytes_sent) as "out"  FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /$host/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system" WITH KEY = "host"
list.label: Host
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system" WITH KEY = "host"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "disk" WITH KEY = "device"
list.label: Drives for IO/s
list.name: drive
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "disk" WITH KEY = "device"
